summary: This bill, H.R. 49, titled the "No Pro-Abortion Task Force Act," was introduced in the House of Representatives by Rep. Biggs. Its purpose is to prohibit the use of any federal funds for the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) Reproductive Healthcare Access Task Force, which was established in January 2022. The prohibition also extends to any future successor or "substantially similar" task force created by the government. The bill has been referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce for consideration.
